system.description: Spells and spell-like effects targeted on you are turned back upon the original caster. Only spells that have you as a target are turned; effect and area spells and touch spells are not affected. From 7 to 10 (1d4+6) spell levels are affected, rolled secretly. When targeted by a spell of higher level than the turning you have left, that spell is partially turned. If both you and an attacker have spell turning, a resonating field is created with random effect: spell drains, both affected, both turnings disabled 1d4 min., or both sent to another plane.

components.materialDescription: A small silver mirror (arcane); divine focus (divine).
